mapper.insert: UPDATE shop_info i INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info c ON i.shop_id = c.shop_id SET i.upload_commodity_balance = i.upload_commodity_balance + 1 WHERE c.commodity_id = #{commodityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_info i SET i.score = ( SELECT AVG(c.score) FROM shop_commodity_evaluate c WHERE c.item_id = i.shop_id )
mapper.select: select * FROM shop_info i where i.category_id = (select ct.category_id from shop_category c INNER JOIN shop_category_top ct ON c.category_pid = ct.category_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categorySecId});
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_info where uid=#{uid} and status = 0
select COUNT(*) from shop_info s WHERE s.category_id in (select category_id from shop_category where category_pid = #{categoryId}) AND status=0 and area_divide = #{areaDivide}
select shop_id from shop_info where uid = #{uid} and status = 0

select s.shop_id,s.shop_name,s.score,s.localhost_latitude,s.localhost_longitude,i.origin_path as userImage, s.shop_introduce, s.tag_list,s.address,s.membership from shop_info s JOIN image i ON i.image_id = s.user_image WHERE category_id in (select category_id from shop_category where category_pid = #{categoryId}) AND status=0 and area_divide = #{areaDivide} LIMIT ${page},${limit}
select upload_commodity_balance from shop_info where shop_id=#{shopId};
select s.upload_commodity_balance FROM shop_info s INNER JOIN shop_commodity_info sc ON s.shop_id=sc.shop_id WHERE sc.commodity_id=#{commodityId}
select qrcode from shop_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and status = 0

select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.score, s.localhost_latitude, s.localhost_longitude, i.origin_path as userImage, s.shop_introduce, s.tag_list, s.address, s.membership from shop_info s JOIN image i ON i.image_id = s.user_image where s.category_id = #{categoryId} and s.status = 0 and s.area_divide = #{areaDivide} LIMIT ${page},${limit}
